BR_text.BRsummary: Document for publishing react based component is incomplete
BR_text.BRdescription:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
 
 The recursive-include path in  is , but the <denchmark-link:https://docs.streamlit.io/en/latest/publish_streamlit_components.html#publish-streamlit-component-to-pypi>document</denchmark-link>
  did not mention you need to change  into . Following the current documentation may build a wheel file without the frontend assets.
 <denchmark-h:h1>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
 
 Follow the documentation to build a wheel file for a custom component
 <denchmark-h:h2>Expected behavior:</denchmark-h>
 
 The document should include the step of editing MANIFEST.in file
 <denchmark-h:h2>Actual behavior:</denchmark-h>
 
 The document does not include this step
 <denchmark-h:h2>Is this a regression?</denchmark-h>
 
 No

comments_0.comment_text: Thanks for highlighting this, I'll take a look a little later today
